![Jim Mastergeorge Website](https://www.robinsontexas.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4128 "Jim Mastergeorge Website")

[City Council](https://www.robinsontexas.org/Directory.aspx?DID=19)
Title: Council Member, Place 4
[Email](mailto:jamesm@robinsontexas.org)

Jim Mastergeorge was born and raised in Middletown, CT. He served in the U.S. Air Force as a Disaster Preparedness NCO and Instructor in Nuclear, Chemical, and Biological Warfare. After leaving the military in 1969, he was employed as a Jet Engine Overhaul Mechanic for Pratt & Whitney Aircraft in Cheshire, CT, retiring in 2006 after 35 years of service.

Jim and his wife, Dolores, have been married for over 51 years. They moved to Robinson in 2008 and have two children, a son, Russell, and a daughter, Melanie, and three grandchildren,  Abby,  Toby,  and Paisley.

He is currently serving as a City Councilmember and has previously served as Mayor Pro-Tem of the City of Robinson.

* Vice Chair of the City of Robinson Fire Department Advisory Committee
* Past Member of the City of Robinson Planning and Zoning Commission
* Past Board Member of the Waco Police Department Citizens on Patrol
* Past Board Member of the Providence Hospital Advisory Board
* Past Board Member of the Experimental Aviation Association Chapter 59, McGregor, TX
